Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.physics

Interface GravityAffected

All Superinterfaces:
MovingEntity
public interface GravityAffected extends MovingEntity
An extension of the MovingEntity interface, providing additional functionality related to gravity.

    • getGravity

      float getGravity()
      Gets the gravity acceleration of this object. This will be used to change the velocity vector every frame.
      Returns:
      the gravity acceleration of this object

    • stopAtBarrier

      default void stopAtBarrier(@NotNull @NotNull Object barrier, @NotNull @NotNull Time deltaTime)
      Detects collision of this object with another axis-aligned rectangle object and blocks the movement of this object so that it stops at the specified barrier.
      Specified by:
      stopAtBarrier in interface MovingEntity
      Parameters:
      barrier - a stationary axis-aligned rectangle object (GlobalRect, FloatRect, Shape, or Sprite)
      deltaTime - the time difference between the last two scene frames (typically from the AnimatedEntity.animate(com.rubynaxela.kyanite.util.Time, com.rubynaxela.kyanite.util.Time) method)
